QString VhdlGeneral::useDefaultType ( const int  leftBound,
const int  rightBound 
)

Create a string that defines a vhdl type.

If the size of the given bounds is 1 then "std_logic" is returned. If the size is greater than 1 then "std_logic_vector" is returned.

Parameters:
leftBound The left bound for the type.
rightBound The right bound for the type.
Returns:
QString contains the the type.

Definition at line 14 of file vhdlgeneral.cpp.

Referenced by VhdlSignal::VhdlSignal().

QString VhdlGeneral::vhdlType2String ( const QString &  type,
const int  leftBound = -1,
const int  rightBound = -1 
)

Create a string that contains the type and bounds for it.

For std_logic_vector created string is: std_logic_vector(<left> downto <right>) For std_logic created string is (bounds do not matter): std_logic For integer created string is: integer range <right> to <left>

Parameters:
type Specifies the vhdl type.
leftBound The left bound or the higher bound for the type.
rightBound The right bound or the lower bound for the type.
Returns:
VhdlGeneral::QString

void VhdlGeneral::writeDescription ( const QString &  description,
QTextStream &  stream,
const QString &  lineSeparator = QString(""),
bool  addStartComment = true 
)

Write a description of some element to the stream.

Parameters:
description The description to write.
stream The text stream to write into.
lineSeparator The separator that is added to the beginning of each new line. For example setting separator to will add one indentation at beginning of each line.
addStartComment If true then "-- " is added before the description is written.
